channel.title: Revents on Human Pangenome
channel.description: Recent content in Revents on Human Pangenome

item.description: AGBT Human Pangenome Reference Workshop This workshop is hosted by the Human Pangenome Reference Consortium (HPRC), one of the groups responsible for continued development of the human pangenome reference assembly. Members of the HPRC will discuss the strategic vision for implementation of pangenome resources and update the scientific community about expected improvements in the reference genome. The workshop will allow participants to gain a better understanding of GRCh38 and how to use it in their research.
